package.name: readline
package.patch: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} cat ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}-upstream_fixes-1.patch | patch -p1 sed -i '/MV.*old/d' Makefile.in sed -i '/{OLDSUFF}/c:' support/shlib-install
package.install: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} make install DESTDIR=${TGTDIR} mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib mv -v ${TGTDIR}/lib/lib{readline,history}.a ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib rm -v ${TGTDIR}/lib/lib{readline,history}.so ln -sfv ../../lib/libreadline.so.6 ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/libreadline.so ln -sfv ../../lib/libhistory.so.6 ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/libhistory.so
